programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The wars wage on, with Team UK dominating this stage of the competition, will the home-ground advantage keep them on form, or will Team R.O.W cause a spectacular upset?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Learn more about this infamous Robot and the family that built it. With an unforgettable design and devastating weapon, this competitor became an instant icon.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Debuting in the Second Wars, to becoming the most successful Robot ever to take part in Robot Wars. This Robot put the squeeze on all the competition, including the House Robots.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Newcomers, veterans and a recent President enter the fray in this first Heat of the series. Competitors are eliminated left, right and centre and only the strongest will survive to compete in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A veteran only heat features the current reigning Champions, Carbide. Will Carbide’s streak be brought to an end by the other robots, more experienced and eager than ever?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Even the judges aren’t safe as two robots collide, sending shrapnel through the bullet-resistant shields around the arena. Two very different styles of robot meet in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One newcomer stares down seven veterans, will their induction into the arena be successful, or will their inexperience find them in the pit? One robot will have a second chance to qualify in the Redemption Round.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The final heat features only veterans, here for an opportunity to make up for their mistakes in the previous tournaments. Only one competitor will make it into the Grand Finals, and the others must suffer defeat, again.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: After lengthy repairs and inspirational pep talks, the qualifiers prepare to fight for the title. A 10-way Robot Rumble will give the victor a spot in the Grand Finals, alongside the heat winners.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: The most battle-hardened combat robots in the UK compete in the MechMania Grand Final. After three grueling heats, only the toughest survive. The tournament is now a single-elimination, 1v1, sudden-death formatuntil one team emerges as the victorious champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Extreme series begins with a vengeance battle to settle a bitter rivalry. Two All-stars battles to put the fan favourites up against each other and a final battle with the Challenge belt at stake to up the pressure for the competitors.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This action-packed episode features several battles, including Wild Card Warriors, Middleweight Championship and Vengeance. All building up to the main event; Mayhem Battle, where three veterans fight for glory.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The battles this episode include; All-stars, another Mayhem battle and the Challenge belt. Robots from the UK, USA, The Netherlands and Germany fight for your entertainment and their pride in International Inferno.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A rivalry will be settled in tonight’s main event, a vengeance battle between Razer and Pussycat. Razer claims in their last fight Pussycat had broken a “Gentleman’s Agreement” by causing unnecessary damage after the robot was immobilised.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Tag Team Terror, Mayhem and Vengeance all precede this episode’s main event, a one-off Armed Forces Mayhem. Robots from the British Army, Navy and Royal Air Force go to war to prove who is most efficient in combat.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Two robots fight over the title “Best showman” in this episode’s Vengeance Main Event. In the build-up, we see a three way International Melee between the UK, Belgium and The Netherlands, Tag Team Terror, Challenge Belt and Mayhem battle.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six robots will be reduced down to one in this annihilator episode. Qualifiers from the Mayhem battles previously in the series. Which competitor will battle through the four rounds and defeat the opposition in the final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Extreme series returns to its normal format after the first Annihilator. Four mixed battles, followed by a Main Event, which in this episode is an All-Stars battle between Pussycat and Stinger.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Shunt and Dead Metal prepare to be let loose from the sidelines in this episodes Main Event, House Robot Rebellion. Three unfortunate competitors will be put into the arena as the House Robots have free reign in this destructive episode.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: We have reached the Quarter Finals for the All-Stars battles in this episode’s Main Event and another Mayhem battle puts another three robots up against each other.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.
